name: Devobot
description:
This project was created as part of the Emotional Game Jam 2020. The themes of the game were: "Emotional Death and Robots", followed by "Recycling".

A tutorial is included in the game. Mouse control only. FRENCH ONLY (For now) Team :

Benjamin Mottier : Gameplay Programmer

Maxime Canuet : Programmer/Environment Integrer

Simon Billieres : 3D Animator/Writter

Maxime Bodereau : Game Design/3D Artist
